provide reliable design, engineering, and project management services for all Facade projects, satisfying the applicable health, safety, environmental, statutory, regulatory & contractual requirements, and stakeholders’ objectives. We shall possess adequate quality system procedures & objectives to achieve the above and are committed to:

  • Create total awareness within the organization
  • Provide optimum resources to facilitate adherence

Alutech is an Integrated Management System (IMS) certified company and has established, implemented and maintained effective Quality, Occupational Health, Safety and Environmental Management System, in line with the requirements of ISO 9001:2008, ISO 14001: 2004 and OHSAS 18001:2007 to ensure that customer satisfaction and requirements are being met.

Group intends to conduct all of its operations in such a manner as to prevent incidents, injury, ill-health and pollution and to encourage the conservation of our natural resources henceforth, Alutech with its hired subcontractors along with its Clients has committed to comply and adhere to all local and internationally acclaimed accepted compliance standards, system rules and regulations, construction practices and codes of conduct.

Alutech periodically reviews its procedures, plans, policy and commitment statements for its suitability, satisfaction and growth in compliance with its Client’s QHSE requirements, Policy and System Safety Rules.
